abstract: Financial advisers say that future tax landscape is difficult to predict financially, so they are counseling their clients to make use of the tax advantages currently in effect.
snippet: It’s hard to say what the tax situation will be in the future, financial advisers say, so they counsel their clients to make use of the tax advantages still in effect.
lead_paragraph: It’s hard to say what the tax situation will be in the future, financial advisers say, so they counsel their clients to make use of the tax advantages still in effect.

headline.main: Take Advantage of Tax Breaks Now, Experts Say
headline.print_headline: Take Advantage of Tax Breaks Now, Experts Say
headline.seo: Take Advantage of Tax Breaks While You Can, Experts Say
